Unchart

Checked in by Date Range Report

10 Mar 2012

Here’s a report by Bill Sweeney from Mid-State Health.

It generates a nice flat file list of appointments that you can select by date. Includes check in time, date, check out time, and optionally who did the check in.

I love ‘flat file’ reports like this – it allows you to do your own analysis in an easier tool like Excel (See my Data-Driven Practice page) With just a few extra columns and a pivot table, I could answer questions like: Are Monday Appointments longer? Do my receptionists share check-in equally?


Checked in by Date Range

Jonathan Ploudré
